controller.account_confirmation: The account has been successfully confirmed. You can now login!
controller.change_password: The password has been changed successfully. Login with the new password chosen.
controller.password_reset: An email has been sent with the steps to reset the password.
controller.security_updated: Security updated successfully. Now the next time you log in to your account, the code currently entered will be requested. Keep it well.
controller.session_logout: Session closed successfully. We hope to see you again here. :)

service.confirmation_error_token: The account confirmation token is not valid.
service.duplicate_user: We are sorry but the user cannot be processed because a user with this data already exists. Try again by changing the registration data.
service.error_signup: We are sorry but we were unable to process the user. Please try again later.
service.invalid_credentials: We are sorry but the email or password is incorrect. Please try again and correct the credentials entered.
service.no_permission: This account does not have sufficient permissions to perform this action. Please contact us if you think it is a mistake.
service.password_error_reset_email: We are sorry but an error occurred while processing the password change request. Please try again later.
service.password_token_expiration: Could not set a new password. Token has expired or is invalid.
service.security_code_failed: The security code is incorrect. Please try again later.
service.security_no_enabled: This account has no two-step verification activated.
service.send_email: We are sorry but we were unable to send the confirmation message to your email. Please contact us to solve it as soon as possible.
service.session_already_exists: An active session already exists on this device. Please close the active session to continue.
service.session_invalid: This session is invalid. Please log in again to continue.
service.session_not_exists: This session does not exist. Please log in again to continue.
service.suspension_account: We are sorry but this account is suspended. Please contact us to verify if this is a mistake and to solve this problem.
service.user_not_found: We are sorry but the user could not be found.
service.user_session_error: We have problems closing the user session. Please contact us to help you as soon as possible.

general.account_no_permission: The account does not have sufficient permissions to complete this action.
general.process_failed: There was a problem processing the request.

service.type_photo: It is necessary to specify the type of photo.
